allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add intelligent auto-response system for MercadoLibre questions

Implements a token-optimized system that automatically answers customer questions using:
- Pre-defined templates for common questions (0 tokens)
- Cached responses for similar questions (0 tokens)
- AI-generated responses only when necessary (~150 tokens)
- Product characteristics pre-generated and stored locally

Key features:
- 20+ generic Q&A templates in Spanish and English
- SQLite database for product listings and answer cache
- Automated cron job execution every minute
- Custom greeting and farewell messages
- Estimated 95% token savings vs pure AI approach

Files added:
- auto_answer_questions.py: Main response system
- save_listing_data.py: Database management
- generate_product_characteristics.py: One-time AI extraction
- auto_responder_loop.sh: Continuous monitoring script
- docs/questions/: Templates and configuration
- AUTO_ANSWER_SYSTEM_README.md: Complete documentation

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(then sqlite3 storage/listings_database.db "SELECT COUNT(*) as total, COUNT(item_id) as with_item_id FROM listings;")
Bash(else echo "Base de datos no existe")
Bash(then sqlite3 storage/listings_database.db "SELECT asin, item_id, country FROM listings ORDER BY asin;")
